(Heat/Fire [fire], Armor Negating [armornegating], Defense Negate [defnegate])
The Smokeless Flame is the primordial fire from which the Jinn were spawned. It is a pure green and yellow flame that burns with supernatural heat. Those hit, even if resistant to heat, will suffer badly. Everyone close to the eruption might be set ablaze by the heat.
